reviews.customers_say: Customers find this wool sweater to be of great quality, wonderfully soft, and true to size. They appreciate its color, warmth, and comfort, noting it's not itchy. They like the fit, with one customer mentioning it hangs well without accentuating their belly, and another noting it looks and feels like cashmere.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice merino
items.body: This sweater is very soft and not itchy. Great color, true to size and perfect weight. Read more
items.author: sharon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit
items.body: It's a great sweater, light, the color I picked is great. Keep me warm and fits nicely! Read more
items.author: K Pak

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm and good looking sweater
items.body: soft and not itchy. Warm, love the color of off white, fits well and true to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!
items.body: Soft. Excellent quality. Perfect thickness. Vibrant color (it is a deep "carmin" - not a burgundy). I weigh 148 and am 5.5 Ft. I originally bought a size L which gave me a fitted look. That was nice but I prefer a looser fit so returned the size L and bought a size XL which works better for me to wear with a long sleeve blouse underneath. I haven't washed it yet but given that it is wool, I will wash it by hand. BTW- I have bought 3 more in black, navy and dark gray. These are sweaters that believe I can wear for several years to come. Read more
items.author: Lemonblossoms

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater is so good!
items.body: A 100% merino sweater for this price is a steal! No need to size up in this one. I'm a 5'2" 133lbs lifter girlie and the size small sweater is a bit oversized, which is fine with me. The yarn is soft and warm--- not at all scratchy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pilling during first day of wearing
items.body: Pilled after one day of wearing! Read more
items.author: K.C.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Warm
items.body: Warm and matches picture Read more
items.author: Ashley C. Rangel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh
items.body: Well, the color isn't as pictured. It's more of a true red than a wine or burgundy. It certainly makes a good Christmas sweater. It is 100% wool, as described, but it's the cheapest, scratchiest wool and very thin. I think this could only be hand washed or it will pill up terribly and probably get pulled and stretched out of shape, even in a net bag. I'll wear it for Christmas only, with an undershirt, and probably not wear it again until next Christmas. Read more
items.author: Sarah Green

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Blue, Apricot, Deep Gray, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Red, Red, Khaki, Beige, Yellow, Light Purple, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
